item.title: Janey add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Janey add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Janey add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Janey add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "It's called civilization. Women invented it, and every time you men blow it all to bits, we just invent it again." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Janey add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Everybody dies. What matters is what you do between now and when it happens to you." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Janey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Good books are as friends, willing to give to us if we are willing to make a little effort." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jenkin Lloyd Jones
item.description: "Anyone who imagines that bliss is normal is going to waste a lot of time running around shouting that he has been robbed. The fact is that most putts donâ€™t drop, most beef is tough, most children grow up to be just like people, most successful marriages require a high degree of mutual toleration, and most jobs are more often dull than otherwise. Life is just like an old time rail journey ... delays, sidetracks, smoke, dust, cinders, and jolts, interspersed only occasionally by beautiful vistas and thrilling bursts of speed. The trick is to thank the Lord for letting you have the ride." -- Jenkin Lloyd Jones

item.title: Janey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Mediocrity will never do. You are capable of something better." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Janey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Work at our responsibility as parents as if everything in life counted on it." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Janey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Let us never forget to pray. God lives. He is near. He is real. He is not only aware of us but cares for us. He is our Father. He is accessible to all who will seek Him." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Janey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "If we could follow the slogan that says,"Turn off the TV and open a good book" we would do something of substance for a future generation." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Janey add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Janey add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "The man who reads nothing at all is better educated than the man who reads nothing but newspapers." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Janey add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I would rather be exposed to the inconveniences attending too much liberty than to those attending too small a degree of it." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Janey add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I had rather be shut up in a very modest cottage with my books, my family and a few old friends, dining on simple bacon, and letting the world roll on as it liked, than to occupy the most splendid post, which any human power can give." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Janey add a quote by Alan Keyes
item.description: "Freedom is not an unlimited license, an unlimited choice, or an unlimited opportunity. Freedom is first of all a responsibility before the God from whom we come." -- Alan Keyes

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jonah Goldberg
item.description: "If there is ever a fascist takeover in America, it will come not in the form of storm troopers kicking down doors but with lawyers and social workers saying. "I'm from the government and I'm here to help." -- Jonah Goldberg

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jonah Goldberg
item.description: "America's political system used to be about the pursuit of happiness. Now More and more of us want to stop chasing it and have it delivered." -- Jonah Goldberg

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jonah Goldberg
item.description: "The government cannot love you, and any politics that works on a different assumption is destined for no good." -- Jonah Goldberg

item.title: Janey add a quote by Rush Limbaugh
item.description: "Liberals measure compassion by how many people are given welfare. Conservatives measure compassion by how many people no longer need it." -- Rush Limbaugh

item.title: Janey add a quote by Rush Limbaugh
item.description: "No nation has ever taxed itself into prosperity." -- Rush Limbaugh

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "Somebody just gave me a shower radio. Thanks a lot. Do you really want music in the shower? I guess there's no better place to dance than a slick surface next to a glass door." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "Where lipstick is concerned, the important thing is not color, but to accept God's final word on where your lips end." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jim Henson
item.description: "As children, we all live in a world of imagination, of fantasy, and for some of us that world of make-believe continues into adulthood." -- Jim Henson

item.title: Janey add a quote by Jim Henson
item.description: "Simple is good." -- Jim Henson

item.title: Janey add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Janey add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Janey add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Janey add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "How did it get so late so soon?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Janey add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "If things start happening, don't worry, don't stew, just go right along and you'll start happening too." -- Dr. Seuss
